QAPair.Question: What is (are) D-dimer test ?
QAPair.Answer: D-dimer tests are used to check for blood clotting problems. Blood clots can cause health problems, such as: Deep vein thrombosis (DVT) , Disseminated intravascular coagulation (DIC) , Pulmonary embolism (PE) , Stroke ,

QAPair.Question: Who is at risk for D-dimer test? ?
